title: Bohemian Duplex Retreat with Mountain Views near the Heart of Nowy Sacz
description: Step into the extraordinary with this spacious 5-bedroom duplex, where natural light paints creative canvases on wide walls and vaulted ceilings. Two full bathrooms, including an indulgent ensuite, bring comfort to every morning. This thoughtful home is enhanced by eco-forward touches such as a rainwater collection system leading directly to the lush private garden. Designed for both inspiration and function, it's an inviting space for family life and boundless ideas. A private parking space and separate entrances promise convenience and flexibility.
neighborhood_description: Situated in the tranquil Suburb neighborhood of Nowy Sacz, this home is part of a low-density artistic enclave cradled by awe-inspiring mountain views. Despite the arrondissement's peaceful rhythm, the vibrant city center is just minutes away—an inspiring muse for lovers of art, community and culture. Best yet, easy access to major highways places the call of the broader region within reach, balancing retreat with exploration.
lifestyle_benefits: serene environment ideal for creative work
gardens for meditation and plein-air painting
target_buyer: This unique duplex is destined for artists, creatives, or multi-generational families craving tranquility and inspiration in equal measure—those who seek a natural setting that sparks the imagination yet remains close to the pulse of the city center.
market_positioning: With two fully independent floors and a prize location embracing both quiet escapism and networked possibility, this property distinguishes itself as a rare find for creative professionals, outpacing standard suburban offerings through additional space, light, and avant-garde amenities tailored to artistic living.
